name: Electro Hypostasis
title: Electro Hypostasis
desc: Code name: Aleph. A high-purity Electro entity.\nEven if you win at rock-paper-scissors, Aleph is not one to admit defeat.

attributes.source: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with Electro Hypostasis

skills.name: Rock-Paper-Scissors Combo
skills.desc: Deals 2 <span style="color:#FFACFFFF">Electro DMG and then separately performs "<span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Prepare Skill" for <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Rock-Paper-Scissors Combo: Scissors and <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Rock-Paper-Scissors Combo: Paper.

skills.name: Lightning Lockdown
skills.desc: Deals 2 <span style="color:#FFACFFFF">Electro DMG, summons <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Chains of Warding Thunder.

skills.name: Electro Crystal Core
skills.desc: (Passive) When the battle begins, starts with <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Electro Crystal Core.<span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">When Action Phase begins: If this character has yet to gain Electro Crystal Core, then it will gain Electro Crystal Core again. (Triggers a maximum of twice in a single duel)

skills.name: Elemental Sedimentation: Electro
skills.desc: (Passive) When the battle begins, this character gains <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Elemental Lifeform: Electro.
